name: Onion Chips
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. DEX ＋ 10, LongRange Dam ＋20%, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with Dex food)

name: Oracle Lucky Bag
description: Cute Bear’s Oracle lucky bag. Open to gain 8-16 Oracle Dusts, 3-7 Oracle Crystals with a chance to gain purple Headwear [Cute Bear].

name: Orange
description: The scarlet round fruit has a sweet taste and can be eaten directly or made into a drink. It can restore 40-98 points of HP and 35-70 points of SP.

name: Orange Dream Juice
description: Fascinating red candy that brings new year's blessing! The new year should be happy now. (Restores 20% of your SP)

name: Orange Potion
description: Potion made from crushed red herbs and yellow herbs. Use it to restore 150-180 points of HP.

name: Orb Doll Hat
description: The Orb Ultraman lying on head. Facing the evil, you should dare to say, "No!"
effect: Base EXP of killing monsters ＋4%,Job EXP of killing monsters ＋4%

name: Orb Doll Hat Blueprint
description: The Orb Ultraman lying on head. Facing the evil, you should dare to say, "No!"

name: Orb Doll Hat [1]
description: The Orb Ultraman lying on head. Facing the evil, you should dare to say, "No!"
effect: Base EXP of killing monsters ＋4%,Job EXP of killing monsters ＋4%

name: Orc Claw
description: Sharp Orc Claws. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Orc Helm
description: Orc's helmet. The style of the Orc's headwear is quite primitive.

name: Orc Helm Blueprint
description: Orc's helmet. The style of the Orc's headwear is quite primitive.

name: Orc Helm [1]
description: Orc's helmet. The style of the Orc's headwear is quite primitive.

name: Orc Hero's Shield
description: People judge the masks worn by of the goblin people.
